thread.title: Ben Nurdin
thread.title_full: Rapid Formations reviewed by Ben Nurdin

author: Ben Nurdin
title: Ben Nurdin
text: Rapid Formations are a genuinely great company that make setting up a company simple and fast. More importantly however, all the details and information you need is all there and there are a host of options that can be selected if you need them. There is no pressure either to take advantage of certain options/aspects but everything is neatly described so you can see what you are buying and what you might need. I would not hesitate to use them again.
